item.title: 互联网档案馆因网络攻击而中断的最新图书馆
item.description:
与俄罗斯有关的团伙对免费网络图书馆发动拒绝服务攻击。【原文：

Russian-linked gang wages denial-of-service attack on free internet library.

】

item.title: 摩根大通计划转移与 30 亿美元贷款组合相关的风险
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is selling a significant risk transfer linked to a portfolio of about $3 billion in net asset value loans, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 克里斯-克里斯蒂加入布莱恩-卡恩辩护律师对失败基金的调查
item.description: 新泽西州前州长克里斯-克里斯蒂（Chris Christie）正在帮助为布莱恩-卡恩（Brian Kahn）辩护，布莱恩-卡恩是 B. Riley Financial Inc.【原文：Chris Christie, the former New Jersey governor, is helping to defend Brian Kahn, a former key client of B. Riley Financial Inc., in an ongoing criminal investigation into the collapse of hedge fund Prophecy Asset Management.】

item.title: 迪拜空置的棕榈岛即将建造豪华别墅
item.description: 迪拜标志性棕榈树形岛屿中的第二个岛屿很快将成为数百栋豪华别墅的所在地，因为该群岛的开发商已向三家承包商发出了开始建造住宅的绿灯。【原文：The second of Dubai’s iconic palm tree-shaped islands will soon be home to hundreds of luxury villas after the archipelago’s developer gave three contractors the greenlight to begin construction on the homes.】

item.title: 特朗普社交媒体投资者因内幕交易入狱
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体初创公司上市后，该公司的一名投资者将因在交易宣布前利用有关该公司合并计划的机密信息进行交易而服刑 22 个月。【原文：An investor in the company that took Donald Trump’s social media startup public will serve 22 months for trading on confidential information about the firm’s merger plans before the deal was announced.】

item.title: 魁北克部长称资本利得税上调不会阻碍投资
item.description: 魁北克省财政部长表示，加拿大提高资本收益纳入税率是 "合理的"，不会阻碍投资。【原文：Quebec’s finance minister says Canada’s increase to the capital gains inclusion rate is “reasonable” and won’t hamstring investment.】

item.title: ASML 因业绩发布失误遭荷兰监管机构质询
item.description: ASML Holding NV 正与荷兰市场监管机构就该公司提前一天错误公布财务业绩一事进行谈判。【原文：ASML Holding NV is in talks with the Dutch market regulator about the company’s erroneous publication of its financial results a day earlier than scheduled.】

item.title: 瑞士不会对子公司实施欧盟的俄罗斯制裁措施
item.description: 瑞士决定不全面执行欧盟对俄罗斯的最新一揽子制裁措施，称瑞士法律已经允许采取措施起诉设在该国的公司的子公司。【原文：Switzerland has decided not to fully implement the latest package of European Union sanctions against Russia, saying Swiss law already allows measures to prosecute subsidiaries of companies based in the country.】

item.title: 全球通胀因素继续向好
item.description:
那袋子里有多少薯片？【原文：

How many chips are there in that bag?

】

item.title: 监督机构称芝加哥应考虑裁员和提高酒税
item.description: 监督组织 "公民联合会"（Civic Federation）表示，芝加哥市应探索从休假、提高酒税到征收服务税等一系列方案，以解决该市 "不可持续 "的赤字问题。【原文：Chicago should explore a range of options from furloughs to higher liquor taxes to levies on services to address the city’s “unsustainable” deficits, according to the Civic Federation, a watchdog group.】

item.title: 台积电多头期待强劲业绩支撑股价创新高
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：The rebound in shares of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. to a fresh record faces a key test with its earnings report Thursday, after ASML Holding NV’s surprisingly weak forecast spooked chip investors.】

item.title: 阿波罗认为私人信贷的 "下一个前沿 "存在 75 万亿美元的缺口
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：In its quest to double its size by 2029, Apollo Global Management Inc. is ramping up its ability to write jumbo checks to high-grade corporations as it delves deeper into what it calls private credit’s next frontier.】

item.title: 钻石寻求批准将百利体育品牌更名为 FanDuel
item.description: 破产的体育广播公司钻石体育集团（Diamond Sports Group）正在寻求法院批准，根据与博彩业巨头达成的冠名权协议，将其百利体育地方频道网络重新冠名为 FanDuel。【原文：Bankrupt sports broadcaster Diamond Sports Group is seeking court permission to re-brand its network of Bally Sports local channels to FanDuel under a naming rights deal with the betting giant.】

item.title: 埃尔德里奇将购买蓝猫尾第三支 GP 赛马基金 10% 的股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，埃尔德里奇工业公司（Eldridge Industries）已同意收购 Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Eldridge Industries has agreed to buy 10% of a Blue Owl Capital Inc. fund that owns minority stakes in top-tier alternative asset managers including Vista Equity Partners and Silver Lake Management, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚将在非洲国家首次公开募股中筹资 2.55 亿美元
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚正在寻求通过出售一家国营无线公司的股票筹集 300 亿比尔（约合 2.55 亿美元），这将成为该国首次公开募股，并为启动证券交易所铺平道路。【原文：Ethiopia is seeking to raise 30 billion birr ($255 million) selling shares in a state-run wireless company, making it the nation’s first initial public offering, and paving the way to start a stock exchange.】

item.title: 在首席执行官被调查导致延期后，厄瓜多尔石油公司重启美元债务交易
item.description: 厄瓜多尔石油公司（Ecopetrol SA）再次向海外市场抛售美元债券。此前一周，该公司首席执行官被调查，导致公司推迟了一项交易。【原文：Ecopetrol SA is once again testing the overseas market with an offer to sell dollar bonds. The offering comes a week after an investigation involving its chief executive officer drove the company to postpone a deal.】

item.title: 瑞士政府建议提高销售税以支付养老金
item.description: 瑞士提议从 2026 年起将销售税提高 0.7 个百分点，以帮助支付养老金，并决定削减境外购物的免税进口限额。【原文：Switzerland proposed increasing sales tax by 0.7 percentage points from 2026 to help fund pension payments and has also decided to cut the tax-free import limit for shopping outside the country.】

item.title: 石油交易商为何对 2025 年如此悲观？
item.description: 即使油价在中东动荡的局势中徘徊不前，许多交易商对明年的市场前景仍持悲观态度。【原文：Even as oil prices swirl amid the turmoil gripping the Middle East, many traders have remained resolutely pessimistic about the market outlook for next year.】

item.title: 长期不受青睐的核能正在卷土重来
item.description: 核电长期以来一直在走下坡路，其在世界发电量中所占的比例从 20 世纪 90 年代中期的 18% 降至现在的 9%，减少了一半。现在有了复苏的迹象。【原文：Nuclear power has long been on the decline, its share of the world’s electricity generation halving from 18% in the mid-1990s to 9% today. Now there are signs of a revival.】

item.title: 玛丽安称加拿大央行将在年底前将利率下调一个整点
item.description: 一位顶级经济学家表示，加拿大央行很可能在今年年底前将利率下调整整一个百分点。【原文：The Bank of Canada will likely cut interest rates by a full percentage point by the end of this year, a top economist said.】

item.title: 高盛与摩根大通一样在公布盈利后抛售债券
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is tapping the US investment-grade bond market on Wednesday, a day after posting earnings that surpassed analyst expectations.】

item.title: 南加州蓬勃发展的新太空枢纽
item.description: 嗨，我是旧金山的 Paayal Zaveri 和 Ed Ludlow。我们最近来到南加州，目睹了一个蓬勃发展的太空制造中心，其部分动力来自 SpaceX。但首先 ...【原文：Hi, It’s Paayal Zaveri and Ed Ludlow in San Francisco. We recently traveled down to Southern California to bear witness to a flourishing space manufacturing hub, ignited in part by SpaceX. But first …】

item.title: SpaceX 声称在加州发射问题上对马斯克存在政治偏见
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司起诉了加利福尼亚州的一家机构，因为该机构否决了该公司在该州进行更多的火箭发射，声称该机构的动机是针对这位亿万富翁首席执行官的观点的 "赤裸裸的政治歧视"。【原文：Elon Musk’s SpaceX sued a California agency for voting down additional rocket launches by the company in the state, claiming it was motivated by “naked political discrimination” against the billionaire chief executive for his views.】

item.title: 泰莱（Tate & Lyle）在《金融时报》报道 Advent 正在准备竞购后大涨
item.description: 在《金融时报》报道收购集团 Advent International 正在准备收购要约后，配料公司泰莱（Tate & Lyle Plc）股价大涨。【原文：Ingredients company Tate & Lyle Plc surged after the Financial Times reported that buyout group Advent International is preparing a takeover bid.】

item.title: 美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）暂停生产流感疫苗后，诺瓦维克斯股价大跌
item.description: 在一名临床试验参与者发生严重不良事件后，美国监管机构暂停了 Novavax 公司试验性流感疫苗的开发，之后该公司股价下跌了 20%。【原文：Novavax Inc. shares fell 20% after US regulators placed a hold on the development of its experimental flu vaccines following a severe adverse event that occurred in a single clinical trial participant.】

item.title: 伊朗哈格岛出口终端附近发生石油泄漏
item.description: 据半官方的塔斯尼姆通讯社（Tasnim news agency）援引当地一位航运官员的话报道，伊朗在距离其位于波斯湾的最大出口码头哈格岛（Kharg Island）仅几英里处发生了石油泄漏。【原文：Iran suffered an oil leak just a few miles from Kharg Island, its top export terminal in the Persian Gulf, according to the semi-official Tasnim news agency, citing a local shipping official.】

item.title: Zegona 因费率问题威胁与西班牙电信塔合作伙伴分手
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，Zegona Communications Plc 威胁说，如果不能以更低的价格在西班牙使用这家总部位于德国的铁塔公司的网络，它将中断与 Vantage Towers AG 的长期合同。【原文：Zegona Communications Plc is threatening to break a long-term contract with Vantage Towers AG if it doesn’t get cheaper rates for use of the Germany-based tower company’s network in Spain, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: ASML 首席执行官认为芯片的缓慢复苏将 "持续到 2025 年
item.description: ASML Holding NV 首席执行官克里斯托夫-福凯（Christophe Fouquet）表示，第三季度财报令人失望，引发了整个半导体行业的大范围抛售，他预计芯片市场的缓慢复苏将 "延续到 2025 年"。【原文：ASML Holding NV Chief Executive Officer Christophe Fouquet said he expects a slow chip market recovery to extend “well into 2025,” following disappointing third-quarter earnings that sparked a broad selloff across the semiconductor industry.】

item.title: 路特尼克称，特朗普执政后，苹果和特斯拉将缴纳更高的美国税收
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普过渡团队联合主席霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，在特朗普第二届政府执政期间，苹果公司等企业将在美国缴纳更多的税款。【原文：Howard Lutnick, the co-chair of Donald Trump’s transition team, said firms like Apple Inc. will pay more tax in the US under a second Trump administration.】

item.title: 比特币逼近 70,000 美元，投机者觊觎历史新高
item.description: 随着对风险资产的乐观情绪升温以及美国大选迫在眉睫，比特币多头再次将目光投向 3 月份创下的历史高点。【原文：Bitcoin bulls are setting their sights again on the record highs reached in March with optimism building around riskier assets and the looming US elections.】
